page.title: 18PARENTS SOCIAL ASSOCIATION
page.content: The P.S.A. is made up of parents of the children in our school. They aim to provide social functions for parents of the school children and other people in the villages. They sometimes raise money for the school and buy us things like the computer. They have lots of events during the year. First they run a bonfire party on Bonfire night with an organised firework display, and things to eat, like hot dogs and baked potatoes. In the summer they organise an outside barberque and disco with drinks and beefburgers. Sometimes they have dances in the village hall and one time they had a 'millionaires evening' where they were given lots of toy money and they could gamble it on games. The P.S.A. provide lots of entertainment in the village.
